youScanYourCardT: ^You scan your card to enter the building in the later hours of the day, hoping to find some other evidence to make Arthur's notes clear.
^While scanning the room, you hear a loud scanner failure come from down the hall near the R&D wing, and decide to follow it.
^As you round the corner, you find a man infront of the doors to the R&D department.
^The distinct ping of a card scan's failure rings through the hall once again.
^"Yeah. My card won't scan through this department for some reason."
^"Why don't you have access? Aren't you like the head engineer?"
^"Honestly, I should, but I keep forgetting to get it fixed. Typically Ryan lets me in during when we have meetings."
^"Hey, you wouldn't happen to have access to the R&D department would you? I need to get in there to drop off a report for Isla."
^"Sorry, I don't have access to that room."
^"Maybe it was removed at the beggining of the trimester?"
^"I work in my office for most of my time and I have no reason to be there after hours, so I hadn't really noticed, but yeah, I don't know where it went and it's supposed to be there."
